meanings.sent1: The tinselly decorations sparkled in the light.
meanings.sent2: Her dress was so tinselly, it caught everyone's attention.
meanings.sent3: The tinselly tree looked like it belonged in a fairy tale.
meanings.sent4: The tinselly sky at sunset painted a magical scene.
meanings.sent5: The tinselly wrapping paper made the gift even more special.

meanings.definition: Showy or gaudy in a cheap or vulgar way.
meanings.sent1: The tinselly jewelry clashed with her elegant outfit.
meanings.sent2: The room was filled with tinselly decorations for the party.
meanings.sent3: His tinselly car drew attention for all the wrong reasons.
meanings.sent4: The tinselly display of wealth was off-putting to some.
meanings.sent5: The tinselly costume was a hit at the costume party.
